events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer’s description of receiving the wrong item.
The support ticket has been assigned to an agent specializing in refund cases to handle this request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you received the wrong item and want a refund. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number #12345 and the attached photo shows the wrong product I received instead of my original order.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate your help and look forward to the refund being processed soon.
The refund request has been initiated successfully, and you should see the money back on your account shortly.
We just wanted to follow up to confirm that you have received your refund and are satisfied with the resolution.
As the refund has been successfully processed and confirmed, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey to provide feedback on your recent support experience.
